ValidationRule.description: When a transfer occurs from Core to MMS, we need the core client number
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
ISPICKVAL( LeadSource , "Transfer - Core to MMS") , $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", LEN(Core_Branch_Client_Number__c) = 0)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: When Lead Source is Transfer - Core to MMS, then you need to input a Client number
